attributes.action: compensate victims of untreated B12 deficiency abused by child protection court care orders
attributes.additional_details: Force Child Protection Courts and relevent employees , social services and doctors to pay compensation to all victims of undiagnosed and untreated pernicious anaemia and B12 deficiency who were neurologically damaged by deficiency and then taken into care using private hearings with no witnesses and who suffered   abuse either  sexually , emotionally or phisically because of decisions and actions taken by the court and it`s processes and give back the children who have been affected to their parents
